sense.def:
To assign a task or function to someone
pomeni nekomu dati nalogo ali funkcijo.

seg.quote: She kept calling him up to assign some new task to him.
Mother and father play out the roles assigned to them.

sense.def:
To be assigned to a place or group
pomeni, da nas pošljejo delat v določen kraj ali skupino.

seg.quote: She was assigned to the men's wards.
